summary: A sarcastic playwright in LA gets new neighbors - single mom and 8 y.o. girl. His wife wants kids and babysits the girl. He doesn't want kids yet plays with her to find out how children talk - for his play. Paternal instincts?
cast: Kenneth Branagh|Suzi Hofrichter|Lynn Redgrave|Robin Wright|Peter Riegert|Johnathon Schaech|Kaitlin Hopkins|David Krumholtz|Suzy Joachim|Brett Rickaby|Lucinda Jenney|Stacy Hogue|Banjo|Peri Gilpin|Tamala Jones|Benita Ha|Mark Brandon|Brent Chapman|Markus Redmond|Mark Schooley|Mark D.
